name: Xtensive Strategy
tagline: We Help Coaches Create a BIGGER Story...
description:
Xtensive Strategy specializes in helping start ups and small businesses to take the strategic steps to advance, to differentiate themselves, to align their marketing and gain exposure by creating an efficient and effective plan to reach their online goals. You could call us the strategic architects for online marketing, branding, social media and other internet services.
We provide comprehensive analytics and reports to help you find the appropriate, strategic solution with a creative twist to differentiate you to and make you notable and relatable to your audience. We understand small business needs, budgets, and how to develop a long term strategy that will give you the competitive edge you need to grow in today's marketplace. Our goal is to educate and work alongside you to help you grow your business on and offline through marketing tactics that are authentic and meaningfully separate your business.
